articles.description: Kyle Allman had 24 points and eight assists, Jackson Rowe added 18 points and Cal State Fullerton held off Long Beach State 76-74 on Thursday in a Big West Conference Tournament quarterfinal.
articles.headline: Cal State Fullerton edges Long Beach State 76-74 in Big West

articles.description: The Atlantic 10 Conference Tournament is a homecoming for Rhode Island senior guard Stanford Robinson and sophomore guard Jeff Dowtin.
articles.headline: No. 25 Rhode Island starts with VCU in A-10 tourney

articles.description: Trey Kell scored 16 points and San Diego State won its seventh straight game with a 64-52 victory over Fresno State on Thursday in a Mountain West Conference Tournament quarterfinal.
articles.headline: San Diego State wins 7th straight, beats Fresno State in MWC

articles.description: Aaron Holliday had 34 points, eight assists and seven rebounds, lifting UCLA to an 88-77 victory over Stanford in the Pac-12 Tournament quarterfinals on Thursday.
articles.headline: UCLA beats Stanford 88-77 in Pac-12 quarterfinals

images.caption: Aaron Holiday scores 34 points as the Bruins top the Cardinal 88-77 and advance to the Pac-12 tournament semifinals.
images.name: Holiday leads UCLA past Stanford

articles.description: Andre Spight scored 25 points, Jonah Radebaugh added 20 and fifth-seeded Northern Colorado raced past fourth-seeded Weber State 80-55 on Thursday in the quarterfinals of the Big Conference Tournament.
articles.headline: Northern Colorado races past Weber State 80-55 in Big Sky

articles.description: With a few days of much-needed rest under the belt, the eighth-ranked Cincinnati Bearcats return to work Friday afternoon against Southern Methodist in an American Athletic Conference Tournament quarterfinal at the Amway Center in Orlando, Fla.
articles.headline: No. 8 Cincinnati opens against SMU in AAC tourney
